// src/pages/PaymentPage.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './PaymentPage.css'; const PaymentPage = () => { const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { title, price, quantity } = location.state || {}; // Default values if no data is passed const eventTitle = title || "Coldplay Concert"; const ticketPrice = price || 3500; const ticketQty = quantity || 2; const subtotal = ticketPrice * ticketQty; const tax = subtotal * 0.05; const total = subtotal + tax; const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [cardNumber, setCardNumber] = useState(''); const [expiry, setExpiry] = useState(''); const [cvc, setCvc] = useState(''); const [zipCode, setZipCode] = useState(''); const [country, setCountry] = useState('United States'); const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('card'); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); navigate('/payment-success'); }; return (
See more ▼

Contact info

setEmail(e.target.value)} required />

Payment method

setPaymentMethod('card')} />
{paymentMethod === 'card' && (
setCardNumber(e.target.value)} />
Visa Mastercard Amex
setExpiry(e.target.value)} />
setCvc(e.target.value)} />
setZipCode(e.target.value)} />
)}
setPaymentMethod('cashapp')} />
setPaymentMethod('bank')} />

Order Summary

{eventTitle}

Qty: {ticketQty}

Subtotal ₹{subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Tax (5%) ₹{tax.toFixed(2)}
Total ₹{total.toFixed(2)}
); }; export default PaymentPage;
